ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/DGFiP/Test-Compta-Demat
Language: perl
Ce logiciel permet de contrôler le respect des normes des fichiers d'écritures comptables (FEC) conformément aux dispositions de l'article A.47 A-1 du livre des procédures fiscales.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: darold/ora2pg
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/darold/ora2pg
Language: perl
Ora2Pg is a free tool used to migrate an Oracle database to a PostgreSQL compatible schema. It connects your Oracle database, scan it automatically and extracts its structure or data, it then generates SQL scripts that you can load into PostgreSQL.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ocpi/ocpi
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ocpi/ocpi
Language: perl
The Open Charge Point Interface (OCPI) allows for a scalable, automated roaming setup between Charge Point Operators and e-Mobility Service Providers. It supports authorisation, charge point information exchange (incl transaction events), charge detail record exchange and finally, the exchange of smart-charging commands between parties.

Znuny is a free, open-source, and versatile web-based ticketing system for Customer Service, Help Desk, IT Service Management, and more. It is built for transparency and long-term sustainability and is highly tailorable to your organization's needs.
